Method Detail

register

public void register(Class optimizerClass,
                     String optimizerId)
Register an IOptimizer with a given registry name.

Parameters:
optimizerClass - The class of the IOptimizer to register.
optimizerId - The corresponding name.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the optimizerId is already in use or if the optimizerClass or if the optimizerClass does not belong to an IOptimizer.

register

public void register(Class optimizerClass,
                     String[] optimizerIds)
Register an IOptimizer with a given set of registry names.

Parameters:
optimizerClass - The class of the IOptimizer to register.
optimizerIds - The corresponding names.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if any of the optimizerIds is already in use.

getOptimizer

public IOptimizer getOptimizer(String optimizerId)
                        throws IllegalArgumentException
Get the IOptimizer corresponding to a given registry name.

Returns:
The corresponding IOptimizer.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the optimizerName does not correspond to a registered IOptimizer.
